lyric:
[00:17.837]In this empty void, I found the way to the light
[00:20.627]Can't find my way in this lingering world
[00:23.524]Searching for the answer - the one that I can trust in
[00:26.759]I'm just wandering around
[00:29.243]Still stuck in the shadow
[00:30.822]But I never follow that
[00:32.101]This pain at last
[00:33.117]Soon will pass
[00:33.821]Turn into my own unbeatable strength
[00:34.981]This guy or that guy - dead or alive
[00:36.430]by hiding alone, can't survive
[00:37.922]I don't want to lie to myself
[00:40.721]Keep on the fight, get right
[00:42.459]I'll never lose and cry
[00:43.697]Keep run up day and night
[00:45.338]Time to rewrite
[00:46.343]No matter what anyone say I find my way
[00:50.961]Never go away
[00:53.570]Now, Nobody can stop me no way
[00:56.449]I will make sure not to forget those precious things
[00:59.305]Yeah I'll take a stand get - back all I've lost
[01:02.367]Rise up suddenly in this world
[01:04.208](I don't look back yeah)
[01:05.337]This repetition will repeat 'till the end
[01:07.994]And the regret that's still lingering in my head
[01:10.903]Time to get it all back now turn over
[01:13.968]Rise up suddenly in this world
[01:15.842](I don't look back yeah)
[01:28.870]Now, I know what I gotta do aye
[01:30.789]This world lose the balance,
[01:31.862]but I save you aye
[01:32.910]Try to keep my faith
[01:34.606]Try to bring to my sense
[01:35.943]Life is short, what do I use my life for?
[01:37.716]For change the world,
[01:38.793]right now fight my war
[01:40.490]Keep on the fight, get right
[01:42.007]I'll never lose and cry
[01:43.326]Keep run up day and night
[01:44.934]Time to rewrite
[01:46.254]No matter what anyone say I find my way
[01:50.533]Never go away
[01:53.183]Now, Nobody can't stop me no way
[01:56.062]I will make it so I don't lose sight of myself
[01:58.944]I will unleash it all, unleash everything
[02:01.862]Rise suddenly in this world
[02:03.824](I don't look back yeah)
[02:05.056]No matter how many times, I will stand tall
[02:07.631]Without being afraid, I'll risk it all
[02:10.615]Averting your eyes won't change your true heart
[02:13.551]Rise suddenly in this world
[02:15.343]( I don't look back yeah)
[02:22.530]I gotta go
[02:23.624]Keep defend everything in myself
[02:28.232]I gotta go
[02:29.406]Keep defend everything in myself
[02:32.862]Feel so good yeah
[02:34.330]Without being misled that visions faint
[02:36.303]it's searching for the light
[02:37.157]In the end, to protect who you love,
[02:38.660]all depends on you inside
[02:40.082]My shield's front and back dilemma
[02:41.631]All guards yeah become vanguard
[02:43.008]Stay hungry, Stay foolish
[02:44.207]Whatever happens just run (esskeetit)
[02:46.018](Never go away)
[02:47.031]Now, Nobody can't stop me no way
[02:49.849]I will make sure to not forget these precious things
[02:52.711]Yeah I'll take a stand - get back all I've lost
[02:55.775]Rise up suddenly in this world
[02:57.751](I don't look back yeah)
[02:58.663]This repetition will repeat 'till the end
[03:01.456]And the regret that's still lingering in my head
[03:04.191]Time to get it all back - now turn over
[03:07.255]Rise up suddenly in this world
[03:09.151](I don't look back yeah)
tlyric:
[by:修M-Sophomore]
[00:17.837]在这个空虚的空虚中，我找到了通向光明的道路
[00:20.627]在这个挥之不去的世界里找不到自己的方式
[00:23.524]寻找我可以信赖的答案
[00:26.759]我只是四处闲逛
[00:29.243]仍陷在阴影中
[00:30.822]但我从不这样做
[00:32.101]最后这种痛苦
[00:33.117]很快就过去了
[00:33.821]变成我自己无与伦比的力量
[00:34.981]这个家伙还是那个家伙 - 死了还是活着
[00:36.430]通过独自躲藏，无法生存
[00:37.922]我不想骗自己
[00:40.721]继续战斗，做对
[00:42.459]我永远不会失去和哭泣
[00:43.697]保持日夜奔跑
[00:45.338]是时候重写了
[00:46.343]不管别人怎么说我都找到了自己的方式
[00:50.961]永远不要离开
[00:53.570]现在，没有人可以阻止我
[00:56.449]我会确保不要忘记那些珍贵的东西
[00:59.305]是的，我会立刻退回所有我失去的
[01:02.367]在这个世界上突然升起
[01:04.208]（我不回头看是的）
[01:05.337]这种重复将重复“直到最后
[01:07.994]遗憾的是，我仍然挥之不去
[01:10.903]是时候把它全部拿回来了
[01:13.968]在这个世界上突然升起
[01:15.842]（我不回头看是的）
[01:28.870]现在，我知道我要做什么了
[01:30.789]这个世界失去平衡，
[01:31.862]但是我救你了
[01:32.910]尽量保持我的信仰
[01:34.606]试着带来我的感觉
[01:35.943]生命是短暂的，我用什么来生活？
[01:37.716]改变世界，
[01:38.793]现在打我的战争
[01:40.490]继续战斗，做对
[01:42.007]我永远不会失去和哭泣
[01:43.326]保持日夜奔跑
[01:44.934]是时候重写了
[01:46.254]不管别人怎么说我都找到了自己的方式
[01:50.533]永远不要离开
[01:53.183]现在，没有人不能阻止我
[01:56.062]我会这样做，所以我不会忘记自己
[01:58.944]我会释放一切，释放一切
[02:01.862]在这个世界上突然崛起
[02:03.824]（我不回头看是的）
[02:05.056]无论多少次，我都会站起来
[02:07.631]不要害怕，我会冒一切风险
[02:10.615]避开你的眼睛不会改变你的真心
[02:13.551]在这个世界上突然崛起
[02:15.343]（我不回头看是的）
[02:22.530]我要走了
[02:23.624]继续保护自己的一切
[02:28.232]我要走了
[02:29.406]继续保护自己的一切

[02:34.330]没有被误导，视觉模糊
[02:36.303]它正在寻找光明
[02:37.157]最后，为了保护你爱的人，
[02:38.660]一切都取决于你的内心
[02:40.082]我的盾牌正面和背面两难
[02:41.631]所有卫兵都是先锋
[02:43.008]保持饥饿，保持愚蠢
